generated_text:
- road: The image shows a cobblestone surface that serves as a driving path for vehicles, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A narrow, elevated path with a curb on the right side, adjacent to the road and bordered by a fence, is visible, indicating a pedestrian or cyclist area.
- building: Multi-story residential buildings with windows and roofs are clearly visible on the left side of the street.
- fence: A wire fence running along the right side of the road, separating it from dense vegetation, is present.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the right side of the road and in the background, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- car: Several cars are parked along both sides of the road, including a silver sedan and a dark-colored hatchback.
- motorcycle: A purple motorcycle with an orange cover is parked on the left side of the road.
- person: A person is visible sitting on the motorcycle on the left side of the road.
